languages.text: Вольный Торговец решил{mf||а} судьбу Дома Орселлио — за использование ксеноартефакта и предательство Империума еретики поплатились жизнями. Теперь свите Вольного Торговца предстоит вернуться на корабль и отыскать обратный путь домой — в Простор, через буйство варп-шторма.

traits.locale_text: Вольный Торговец решил{mf||а} судьбу Дома Орселлио — за использование ксеноартефакта и предательство Империума еретики поплатились жизнями. Теперь свите Вольного Торговца предстоит венуться на корабль и отыскать обратный путь домой — в Простор, через буйство варп-шторма.

languages.text: The Rogue Trader has decided the fate of House Orsellio. For tampering with a xeno-artefact and betraying the Imperium, the heretics paid with their lives. Now it is time for the Rogue Trader's retinue to return to the ship and make their way back to the Koronus Expanse through the raging warp storm.
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец решил{mf||а} судьбу Дома Орселлио — за использование ксеноартефакта и предательство Империума еретики поплатились жизнями. Теперь свите Вольного Торговца предстоит вернуться на корабль и отыскать обратный путь домой — в Простор, через буйство варп-шторма.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader has decided the fate of House Orsellio. For tampering with a xeno-artefact and betraying the Imperium, the heretics paid with their lives. Now it is time for the Rogue Trader's retinue to return to the ship and make their way back to the Koronus Expanse through the raging warp storm.

The Rogue Trader has decided the fate of House Orsellio. For tampering with a xeno-artefact and betraying the Imperium, the heretics paid with their lives. Now it is time for the Rogue Trader's retinue to return to the ship and make their way back to the Koronus Expanse through the raging warp storm.

The Rogue Trader has decided the fate of House Orsellio. For tampering with a xeno-artefact and betraying the Imperium, the heretics paid with their lives. Now it is time for the Rogue Trader's retinue to return to the ship and make their way back to the Koronus Expanse through the raging warp storm.

The Rogue Trader has decided the fate of House Orsellio. For tampering with a xeno-artefact and betraying the Imperium, the heretics paid with their lives. Now it is time for the Rogue Trader's retinue to return to the ship and make their way back to the Koronus Expanse through the raging warp storm.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a décidé du sort de la maison Orsellio. Pour avoir manipulé un xéno-artefact et trahi l'Imperium, les hérétiques ont été mis à mort. Il est maintenant temps pour l'entourage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} de remonter à bord du vaisseau, puis de traverser la furieuse tempête Warp pour retourner dans les Étendues de Koronus.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has decided the fate of House Orsellio. For tampering with a xeno-artefact and betraying the Imperium, the heretics paid with their lives. Now it is time for the Rogue Trader's retinue to return to the ship and make their way back to the Koronus Expanse through the raging warp storm.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a décidé du sort de la maison Orsellio. Pour avoir manipulé un xéno-artefact et trahi l'Imperium, les hérétiques ont été mis à mort. Il est maintenant temps pour l'entourage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} de remonter à bord du vaisseau, puis de traverser la furieuse tempête Warp pour retourner dans les Étendues de Koronus.

languages.text: 行商浪人已经决定了奥赛罗家族的命运。由于擅自利用异形造物，犯下了背叛帝国的罪名，这些异端分子已经付出了生命的代价。现在，行商浪人和随行人员应该回到飞船，穿过肆虐的亚空间风暴，返回科罗努斯扩区。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has decided the fate of House Orsellio. For tampering with a xeno-artefact and betraying the Imperium, the heretics paid with their lives. Now it is time for the Rogue Trader's retinue to return to the ship and make their way back to the Koronus Expanse through the raging warp storm.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人已经决定了奥塞罗家族的命运。由于擅自利用异形造物，犯下了背叛帝国的罪名，这些异端分子已经付出了生命的代价。现在，行商浪人和随行人员应该回到飞船，穿过肆虐的亚空间风暴，返回科罗努斯扩区。

languages.text: 自由開拓者はオーセリオ家の運命を決めた。異種族のアーティファクトを改ざんし、帝国を裏切った異端者たちはその命をもって償うこととなった。一方、自由開拓者の仲間は船に戻り、荒れ狂う歪みの嵐を抜けてコロヌス・エクスパンスに帰還しようとしている。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has decided the fate of House Orsellio. For tampering with a xeno-artefact and betraying the Imperium, the heretics paid with their lives. Now it is time for the Rogue Trader's retinue to return to the ship and make their way back to the Koronus Expanse through the raging warp storm.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者はオーセリオ家の運命を決めた。異種族のアーティファクトを改ざんし、帝国を裏切った異端者たちはその命をもって償うこととなった。一方、自由開拓者の仲間は船に戻り、荒れ狂う歪みの嵐を抜けてコロヌス・エクスパンスに帰還しようとしている。

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat über das Schicksal des Hauses Orsellio entschieden. Die Ketzer haben mit ihrem Leben dafür bezahlt, dass sie ein Xeno-Artefakt genutzt und das Imperium verraten haben. Nun muss das Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} auf das Schiff zurückkehren und durch den tosenden Warpsturm zurück in die Koronus-Ausdehnung reisen.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has decided the fate of House Orsellio. For tampering with a xeno-artefact and betraying the Imperium, the heretics paid with their lives. Now it is time for the Rogue Trader's retinue to return to the ship and make their way back to the Koronus Expanse through the raging warp storm.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat über das Schicksal des Hauses Orsellio entschieden. Die Ketzer haben mit ihrem Leben dafür bezahlt, dass sie ein Xeno-Artefakt genutzt und das Imperium verraten haben. Nun muss das Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} auf das Schiff zurückkehren und durch den tosenden Warpsturm zurück in die Koronus-Ausdehnung reisen.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha sellado el destino de la casa Orsellio. Por manipular un xenoartefacto y por traicionar al Imperium, los herejes han pagado con sus vidas. Ahora, el séquito de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente debe volver a la nave y regresar a la Extensión de Koronus a través de la furiosa tormenta de disformidad.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has decided the fate of House Orsellio. For tampering with a xeno-artefact and betraying the Imperium, the heretics paid with their lives. Now it is time for the Rogue Trader's retinue to return to the ship and make their way back to the Koronus Expanse through the raging warp storm.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha sellado el destino de la casa Orsellio. Por manipular un xenoartefacto y por traicionar al Imperium, los herejes han pagado con sus vidas. Ahora, el séquito de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente debe volver a la nave y regresar a la Extensión de Koronus a través de la furiosa tormenta de disformidad.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, Orsellio Hanesi'nin kaderini belirledi. Kâfirler, zeno eserleriyle oynama ve İmparatorluk'a ihanet suçlarının cezasını canlarıyla ödedi. Hür Tacir'in maiyeti, artık öfkeli öteboyut fırtınasının içinden geçerek Koronus Enginliği'ne geri dönebilir.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has decided the fate of House Orsellio. For tampering with a xeno-artefact and betraying the Imperium, the heretics paid with their lives. Now it is time for the Rogue Trader's retinue to return to the ship and make their way back to the Koronus Expanse through the raging warp storm.
